entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 01:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: NNE 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
